code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{getTasks}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewTask=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[task,setTask]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTask=async()=>{const tasks=await getTasks();const currentTask=tasks.find(t=>t.id===parseInt(id));setTask(currentTask);};fetchTask();},[id]);if(!task){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading task..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Priority: ",task.priority]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",task.status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Due Date: ",task.due_date]})]});};export default ViewTask;
